inn1.comm: After a false start, Steyn's on target straight away, on a length on middle and leg, Haddin gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
similar length, but more on offstump this time, hint of movement away from the right-hander, pushed towards extra cover
pronounced movement away from Haddin this time, but it started from too far outside off to bother Haddin
a bit of an outside edge this time, squirts away behind square and Australia area way
seam bolt upright from Steyn, around offstump, Clarke blocks it back to the bowler
fuller and sliding onto the pads, Clarke gets off the mark by nudging that towards midwicket
on middle and leg, tapped towards mid-on for a single
very wide outside off, the batsman isn't interested in that one, allows it through to the keeper

Clarke's gone, Ntini bowling from wide of the crease slants the ball in towards the batsman, there gets it to straighten, and has Clarke lunging at the ball, a thick outside edge flies at a very catchable height, straight to JP Duminy at second slip
not a very convincing start from Ponting, it wasn't too short from Ntini, Ponting was looking to leave that but it strikes him high on the back pad
this time Ponting looked more assured, taps a waist high delivery towards midwicket
back of a length, pitching just outside off, Ponting gets a huge stride in and defends it back to the bowler
Haddin is opened out by Steyn, a length ball around off, Haddin was looking to play it straight, the edge flies down to third man
wide outside off, Ponting shoulders arms in typical fashion, getting on the front foot and getting the bat high over his head
much closer to the stumps, Ponting has to play at this one, he blocks it back to he bowler
worked away square off the hips by Ponting, lovely timing on that one, Hashim Amla had to chase a long way to cut that off just inside the boundary
just outside off, in what Damien Fleming likes to call the "avenue of apprehension", left alone by Haddin
nice stride in from Ponting as he pushes it towards mid-off

Ponting was again looking to get a long forward, to a back of a length ball on middle and off, bounced a bit higher than he expected and he had to adjust at the last moment to keep the ball down as he defended towards the bowler
a touch shorter from Ntini, Ponting goes right back as he block this one
slanting into offstump, Ponting looked to thrash that towards mid-on, mistime it and the ball trickles towards the fielder
a bit of width for Ponting to work with, jabs it down to third man for a single
cuts back in sharply after pitching on a length just outside off, Haddin lets that sail through over the stumps, but I wonder whether he was expecting it to jag back as much as it did
overpitched, and on target again from Steyn, Ponting gets on the front foot and pats it back to the bowler
pushed firmly towards mid-off by Ponting, Steyn keeping it very tight here
slightly overpitched, again close to the offstump, Ponting drives to the right of mid-off, Smith has to put in a slide to cut it off at the edge of the circle
slanting onto the pads, Ponting won't miss out on those, worked just behind square for a couple
back of a length, Ponting goes for an extravagant cut, but misses the ball, it wasn't short enough for that stroke
Steyn completes the delivery with one that is slanting towards middle and leg, Ponting turns it towards mid-on

short ball, wonderfull line, just outside off, Haddin showing signs of frustration here by sashaying down the track to try heave it past point, doesn't make contact with the ball, a stifled appeal for caught behind
keeping it around off, and it's nudged towards cover
length ball, on off, Haddin backs away from the stumps and flat bats it down the ground for four
short of a good length, dabbed into covers for a very quick single
a bit of room for Ponting, he flails at it, bottom hands come as he plays the shot, the placement is poor and it doesn't beat de Villiers at point
slanting towards the pads, tucked towards square leg, no run again
Steyn pitches this on middle and leg, Haddin inside edges it onto his pad, and the ball trickles away towards square leg
length ball on off, extra bounce for Steyn, catches Ponting by surprise, he checks his shot and it balloons towards mid-off, lands well short of the fielder though
full on legstump, Steyn may be trying to straighten after from, this one doesn't and it's easy pickings for Ponting, punched to the wide long-on boundary
driven firmly to mid-off, Smith is on the edge of the circle, enough time to get a single
nice, tight line, Haddin gets on the backfoot and punches it to mid-off
goes for a powerful pull, doesn't quite get hold of it, and it goes to the fielder at square-leg
on offstump from Ntini, Ponting lunges forward and drives towards mid-off, no run this time
pushed towards mid-on by Pointing, no run
length ball but wide, Ponting flashes hard at it, the thick edge is enough to send the ball sailing high over the slips for a boundary
no luck involved in that boundary, slightly fuller than the previous one, Ponting hammers that through the covers for four
pushed to mid-off, batsmen pinch a quick single, Smith was the fielder, he wasn't particularly quick off the mark, it would still have been a close call had there been a direct hit
short delivery, leg-stump line from Ntini, doesn't beat the fielder at square leg
starts with a length ball just outside off, Haddin forces it towards mid-off, no run
short of a length, Haddin rocks back and looks to mow it towards midwicket, mishit and it flies towards mid-off
this time played a lot more conventionally toward mid-off, the batsmen think of a single but don't go for it
fuller on middle and leg, Haddin flicks it off his pads behind square for a single
similar length from Morkel, Ponting gets on the front foot and punches it towards mid-off, just wide enough of Smith to allow time for a single
Haddin's not having the most pleasant of times here, this time he's late on the shot and is struck on the thigh pad
back of a length, on offstump, Ponting hits that through the line of the ball, back over the bowler's head and that's flies away for a boundary
fuller from Ntini, Ponting hits it so straight that it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end,batsmen take a single off the richochet
Ntini reverts to a back of a length, Haddin backs away from the stumps to get some room, and clobbers that between cover and pint
full and well outside off, Haddin manages to squeeze it away but only as far as de Villiers at backward point
low full toss from Ntini, Haddin responds with a full-blooded drive down the ground, Ntini dives during his follow-through to cut the ball off
wonderful ball to end the over, yorker on middle and off, Haddin manages to dig it out
Morkel digs it in short, Haddin gets on his toes and plays it towards backward point
length ball on middle and leg, driven firmly to mid-on, batsmen sprint through for a single
played with soft hands by Ponting towards extra cover, Haddin wants the single but Ponting bellows "No"
strays on to the pads, length ball, Ponting shuffles across his stumps and whips that away towards the fielder at fine leg

ugly-looking shot from Haddin, fetches him four nonetheless, slower ball outside off from Morkel, Haddin gives it the kitchen-sink, the bat turns in his hand as he plays the shot, but it still flies straight down the ground for a boundary
Haddin makes room and plays a shortish ball outside off towards third man for a single to retain the strike
back of a length, on middle stump, Ponting jumps and defends it towards mid-on
similar length, but a touch outside off, Ponting dabs that to third man for a single
good start from Morkel, ties Haddin down with an offstump ball, pitching just short of a length, Haddin blocks it back to the bowler
Haddin, as he has so often this innings, backs away from the stumps, Albie saw him and followed him, a yorker into the batsman, squeezed out by Haddin, and the batsmen pinch a single
on middle and leg, driven down to long-on by Ponting
full on off, Haddin bunts it down the ground towards mid-on, enough time for the batsmen to hustle through for a single
Haddin comes down the track and throws his bat at an offstump ball, doesn't get hold of it, only manages to slice it behind point for a couple
comes into the batsmen after pitching short of a length, Haddin doesn't cover for the movement, is hit on the thigh pad
gets forward and jabs it towards point
shortish ball on leg stump, Ponting plays it off his hip towards midwicket, placement isn't too god though
a jaffa from Morne, back of a length again, in the corridor outside off, Ponting fishes for it but is comprehensively beaten
on offstump this time, Ponting plays it with soft hands towards mid-off, the batsmen set off for the run immediately and completely it with time to spare
good length, draws the batsman forward, played towards extra cover for a single
whoah, Albie completely lost control of that, a no-ball as well, that was way down the legside
not the best ball to bowl on a free-hit, length on middle stump, Haddin backs away and hammers that towards the sightscreen to bring up the first six of the match
wide down the leg side this time from Albie

low full toss this time, Haddin gets it away towards long-on, batsmen decide to come back for two, it's direct hit at the non-striker's end from the boundary, third umpire is called for, but Ponting had made his ground
again Haddin decides to walk down the stumps and towrds the leg side, Albie follows him, flicked to midwicket
Albie keeps it full, this time on off and middle, Ponting drives firmly to long-on
Shot! yet again Haddin backs away, Albie doesn't follow him this time, placement is inch perfect on the thrash through the off, bisects cover and extra cover, and that's four
Morne starts with a pearler, that's a length ball pitching just outside off, Ponting goes for the drive but is beaten
this time Ponting gets behind the line and blocks it back to the bowler
slightly overpitched by Morkel, on middle and leg, Ponting lofts it over mid-on,. timing wasn't particularly good but enough to get it past the fielder and to the boundary

shorter from Morne this time, Ponting tries to repeat the shot, miscued again, and this time he doesn't beat the fielder at mid-on, Albie Morkel runs back a few yards to complete the catch, and Ponting's got to go
shortish and a touch wide, Hussey is content to let that one through to the keeper
length ball on offstump, Hussey gets off the mark with a push wide of extra cover
starts with a very wide ball, a touch short as well, Hussey steers that into the gap behind point and gets a boundary
fuller, and turned to midwicket by Hussey
on middle and leg, Hussey walks across his stumps, flicks it to midwicket
a little short, Hussey gets on the back foot, opens the face to guide it to backward point for a single
speared in towards legstump, Haddin nudges it off his pads for a single
overpitched outside off, a wristy drive from Hussey has it travelling to long-on
starts the over with a wide ball, Hussey drives that uppishly but in the gap between cover and extra cover
full on middle and off, Haddin gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
steps towards the leg side, back of a length ball, Haddin flat bats it over the bowler and to his left for a boundary
attempts a split-finger slower ball, drags it down the leg side, that's a wide
much better line, on middle and off, fullish ball, Haddin defends cautiously
a bit of room outside off, Haddin guides it down to third man for a single, yet another occasion when he stepped towards leg
keeps Hussey honest with a length ball on off, the batsmen defends it off the front foot
played to square leg
Botha keeps it on al ength, around middle and off, played back to the bowler
a touch outside off, opnes the face to play it toward backward point
driven firmly toward mid-on, too firmly to take a single
Botha drags it a touch short, Hussey sweeps it square, JP Duminy sprints across at midwicket to cut it off
full and outside off, good use of the wrists from Hussey, he places it wide of the mid-on fielder for a single
length ball, on off, Hussey pushes it towards cover
lovely ball, pitches just outside off, and straightens, Hussey was looking for the drive but is beaten
on middle stump this time, defended off the backfoot towards cover
length ball on off, Hussey drive but it's cut off by Gibbs at short cover
shortish ball on middle, Hussey goes for the pull, miscued, balloons over Albie Morkel at mid-on, well-timed enough to send it away to the boundary
outside off this time, Hussey glides it down to third man for a single
quicker ball, flat and on middle, Hussey gets behind the line and plays it towards mid-on
shorter, Haddin stays on the backfoot and turns it to square leg, no run
a bit of a it to this one, outside leg, Haddin sweeps it to get off the strike
defended towards point, no run for Hussey
length ball, outside off, Hussey whips it down to long-on
fourth single of the over to end it, again it is played to long-on, this time by Haddin
starts with a full ball on off, punched towards covers
Albie keeps it full, Haddin drives to mid-off, but too firmly to get a single

Horrendous, horrendous mix-up, Hussey's run out, Albie sends down a good yorker, Haddin jabs that towards backward point and took one step before deciding against the run, Hussey was charging down and kept running, both batsmen were nearly at the same end when de Villiers lobbed the ball to Albie, who breaks the stumps at the non-striker's end
a little bit of width from Albie, a delicate shot from Haddin, just helps it on it's way over the vacant first slip for a boundary to bring up his fifty
full and straight, driven down to long on
length ball outside off, driven towards mid-on
down the leg side, and that's a wide
wide outside off, Haddin pads it away
about a foot outside off stump, Haddin stays on the backfoot and glides it to short third man
turned towards midwicket this time, straight to the fielder
full toss on legstump, swept behind square for a single

What is going on here? Another run out, full outside off, Hussey stretches and steers it towards third man, Haddin sets off for the second, Hussey's not interested, Albie throws it from the deep to Boucher, Haddin is yards out of his crease when Boucher breaks the stumps
a bit of turn for Botha, pitched outside off and came sharply into Ferguson who wasn't expecting the spin, misses the ball
length ball outside off, Hussey goes for the off drive, an inside edge takes it towards midwicket
slower ball, 116.2kmph, Hussey is surprised by that one, manages to tap it down to the bowler
a bit of width, an offcutter from Albie, chopped down to backward point
wide down the leg side
back of a length, slanting towards middle and leg, Hussey defends off the back foot
another slower offbreak, 113kph, sliced to third man for a single
length ball outside off, Ferguson walks into a drive, cut off by the sweeper at the boundary
a touch short, spinning in, Ferguson whips it to midwicket, but doesn't beat the fielder
again Ferguson gets it away to midwicket, another dot ball
lot of turn for Botha on this ball, Ferguson misses as he attempts to get it away to the leg side
defended back to the bowler
firmly driven by Ferguson, but Botha gets across to his right to cut it off
finally he gets a run, punched to long-on for a single which helps him retain the strike
Ferguson tries to cut that one from Albie, gets a bottom edge which trickles towards cover
full on middle and leg, Ferguson walks across his stumps and gets it away to midwicket
Albie's sending down a lot of slower balls here, 110kmph, overpitched on the pads, Hussey taps it back to the bowler
another slower ball, this is slightly shorter, Hussey works it behind square, pushes for the second and gets it comfortably
wide outside off, goes for a backfoot drive, which ends up at gully
pitches well outside off and turns in, Ferguson flat bats it powerfully to the long-off fielder
full and pitching on off, Hussey gets on the backfoot to whip it toward mid-on
wide outside off, umpire might have thought about calling that calling that one but decides against it
sweeps it to square leg, no run for Ferguson
Botha goves it a bit of air, Ferguson plays it fine down the leg side, Hussey called for the single, but the batsmen decide not go for it
hit with conviction by Hussey, Albie tests him with the bouncer, pulled to midwicket for a single
watchfully plays a fullish ball towards mid-off
nearly a yorker, on offstump, dug out to short cover
slower ball from Albie, not too well timed a drive from Ferguson, but gets the placement right for a single
short ball again from Albie, that's wasn't too quick either, 117kmph, Hussey crashes that through midwicket for a boundary
a bit of width, Hussey stays on the back foot and jabs it towards backward point for a single
starts off with a full ball that is mistimed to long-on, so poorly timed that they can get two
watchfully defended off the front foot to the bowler
Duminy's giving it a lot of air here, on middle and leg, Hussey dabs it back down the ground
flatter, nearly a yorker, defended off the front foot
flighted this time, Hussey crunches it through covers for a boundary, superb shot that
Duminy does away with the flight, fires it in towards the base of legstump, Hussey manages to keep it out
fullish and well outside off, Ferguson plays a paddle sweep for a single
length ball on offstump, Hussey gets across his stumps and turns it behind square on the leg side
dabbed in front of point for a single
forcefully driven towards extra cover, a diving de Villiers doesn't give away any runs
played with soft hands towards point, nicely done by Ferguson, that's another single
quicker one down the legside, Ferguson sweeps it fine for a single
played to fine leg for another single
Ferguson gets on the front foot and drives it uppishly towards long-off, placed to the left of the fielder, and they get a couple
an ugly, forcing shot which is mistimed back to the bowler
driven with more conviction back to the bowler
overpitched on middle and leg, whipped behind square for a single
quicker delivery from Botha, clipped off the batsman's toes behind square for a single, brings up Australia's 150
tossed up, but sliding down leg, Hussey works it to square leg for a single
the doosra from Botha, Ferguson wanted to play it to leg, but gets a leading edge which lands safely
flighted delivery, defended back to the bowler
on a length on middle, turned to mid-on, no run
driven firmly, mid-on has to run to his left to cut that one off
Duminy flights it, lands on middle and off, easily turned to midwicket for a single
Hussey stays on the backfoot and chops it towards point, no run
driven by Hussey, Duminy gets across to his right to cut if off
driven to short cover this time, another dot ball, good over so far from Duminy
gets a single this time, carted towards long-on
wide down the leg side
punched to long-on for another single
short of a length delivery, outside off, no shot offered by Ferguson
wonderful shot from Ferguson, it wasn't particularly short but Ferguson gets on the backfoot and cuts that powerfully, wide of Duminy at point and the sweeper can't cut if off either
good length delivery, defended watchfully by Ferguson
back of a length, on offstump, Ferguson defends that towards the covers
short ball from Steyn, Ferguson sways out of the way
slower ball from Steyn to end the over, 126kmh (he's been operating in the mid 140s  this over), Ferguson looks to nudge it to the leg side, misses the ball and is rapped on the pads outside off
tossed up by Duminy, on middle and leg, Ferguson goes for the sweep, hit on the pads, no run
lovely drive from Ferguson, gets on the front foot and lashes that through the covers
shorter from duminy, Hussey stays on the backfoot and pushes it towards mid-off
glanced very fine by Hussey, the batsmen sprint through for two
punched confidently by Hussey, but straight to de Villiers at short cover

Steyn strikes, short and pretty wide, Ferguson slashes at it, gets a top edge which flies to Johan Botha at third man, Botha back pedals a few steps to complete that catch, making sure that he doesn't cross the boundary
another bounce from Steyn, Hussey ducks under it, it was down the leg side and the umpire deems it a wide
much fuller and outside off, Hussey dabs it to backward point, straight to the fielder
pitches on off and carries on with the angle, Hussey shoulders arms to that one
easy pickings for Hussey, Steyn strays onto the pads, tickled fine for a boundary
reverts to his offstump line, nicely glided down to third man for a single
a bit wide, Hopes throws his bat at it, firmly hit but placement isn't too good, doesn't beat the man at point
nicely tossed up by Botha, full, driven down to long-on by Hussey
drags it short this time, Hopes gets off the mark with a flat batted shot to long-on
gives it some air again, overpitched on legstump, Hussey works it behind square on the leg side
much quicker from Botha, pushed off the backfoot to extra cover
on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket by Hopes
he continues to toss it up to the left-hander from around the wicket, Hussey drills it along the ground to the fielder at long-on
starts with a shortish ball, defended with an angled bat by Hussey, the ball bounces at his feet and nearly rolls onto the stumps
similar length, just outside off, Hussey gets on the back foot and jabs it to backward point
short and quite wide, lashed to the sweeper at the boundary by Hussey
bowled from very wide of the crease, angling into Hopes, it was a short ball, Hopes gets behind the line and defends
much fuller, just outside off, Hopes gets on the front foot and drives down to long-off
sharp single from the batsmen, Ntini again bowled from very wide of the crease, Hussey gets an inside edge onto the pad
overpitched on legstump, Hussey goes for the sweep, doesn't connect with the ball
closes the face of the bat to get it away to square leg
Hopes backs away to make room, and dabs that towards point
fullish on middle, driven to the fielder at mid-off
low full toss on offstump, Hussey gets on the front foot and powers it to long-on
nudged in front of square leg for a single to end Botha's spell
length ball that was slanting towards middle and leg, Hopes gets across and punches it towards mid-on

Lovely timing from Hopes, same length from Ntini as the previous ball, but it was around offstump this time, Hopes punched it straight down the ground, hardly any power in the shot but the ball raced away
Hopes backs away and stabs the ball towards point,no run
ooh! nearly caught behind, Hopes was going for the straight drive but got an outside edge which flew just wide of Boucher
half-volley on legstump, Hopes can't capitalise on it, his whip goes straight to the fielder
short of a length outside off, jabbed towards short cover, a quick single is pinched
very full, Hopes finds the mid wicket fielder on the flick
full ball, Hopes turns it to mid-on
on offstump, Hopes carves it behind point, but goes straight to the fielder
length ball on middle and off, driven to mid-on for a single
another length ball from Albie, Hussey punches it towards long-on for another single
and finishes the over with a length ball just outside off, Hopes goes for the drive but gets an inside edge onto his pad
he's on target straight away, back of a length, on middle and leg, Hussey is pinned to his back foot and he taps it back to the bowler
more towards the offstump this time, driven towards cover by Hussey, another dot ball
Hussey stays on the backfoot and plays it behind point with soft hands, 'Yes' he calls immediately, and they're through for a single
again a good length, Hopes steers it towards point but no run
short and wide, gets the treatment, Hopes throws his bat at that one, and Amla, the sweeper, had no chance of cutting that off
this time Hopes plays it towards extra cover, too firmly to get a single
overpitched outside off, Hussey lashes that towards extra cover, Botha makes a great dive to take the pace off the ball, they still get a couple
back of a length, keeps it on off, Hussey punches it to long-on and screams "Push, push, push" for the second but the batsmen don't take it
steady stuff from Albie here, Hopes pushes this one down to long-off for a single
fuller on the pads, Hussey gets across and guides it to square leg
lovely yorker from Albie, dug out towards point, a tight single is stolen
low full toss on offstump, Hussey dismisses it towards long-off, only a single to end the over
Morne gets some steepling bounce, 141 kmph, wasn't particularly short, but it bounced much more than Hussey expected, it sails through to the keeper
fuller, Hussey tips it towards mid-on to get off the strike
Morne drags it a bit short, Hopes goes for the pull, not particularly well-timed, Ntini has enough time to come across and cut it off on the square leg boundary
similar length from Morne, firmly struck by Hopes, in front of square this time, but only a single
pitched up this time, Hussey was looking to drive to the on side, gets an inside edge onto his pads
shorter to Hopes, well outside off, Hopes throws his bat at it, the ball speeds away behind square for a single
short and outside off again, Hopes cuts that with a flourish, third man is able to cut that one off
Hussey was coming down the track, Ntini pitched it shorter, Hussey runs it down to third man for a single
a length ball, and width is provided, Hopes cashes in, thrashes it through the covers for a boundary
Ntini goes for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss on legstump, Hopes gets across and guides it to the fine leg boundary, wonderful from Hopes
length ball and close to offstump, Hopes punches it towards extra cover for a single
yorker on middle stump, Hussey was looking to give the charge, he jabs it into the ground and towards the offside for a single
starts with a 146kmph short of length ball, it was close to offstump but Hussey managed to get inside it and dab it to third man to reach his half-century
length and outside off, Hopes carves it to the sweeper for a single
Hussey stays on the backfoot and nudges a length ball behind point, he pushes Hopes into coming for a second
the angle is allowing Hussey to just open the face of the bat and run it towards third man,
wide outside off, Hopes strikes it well, it races across the outfield, but doesn't beat the sweeper
yorker on middle and off, 142kmph, Hussey manages to squeeze it back to the bowler
slower back-of-a-length ball, outside off, Hopes again plays it out to the sweeper for a single
Hussey looks to back away, Morne follows him, Hussey tips it at his feet and sets off for the single, superb running there

Hopes is gone, he saw that the fine leg was up, so he walked across the stumps to pick up a middle stump ball and tried to chip it over fine leg, it looked pretty flamboyant but he didn't get enough on it, and Dale Steyn takes a simple catch to end Hopes' useful knock
shortish and on the pads, Johnson dabs it square for a single to get off the mark
overpitched and wide, Hussey backs away and carves that behind point for a boundary, wonderful placement that
this one is pitched up, Hussey punches it towards long-off, again he wants the second but the batsmen decide against it
Steyn sends down a shortish ball, Hussey steers that towards covers for a single
inches away from the legstump, but that's wide enough to be an illegal delivery

full ball from Steyn, not much footwork from Johnson as he tried to smear it through the offside, gets a faint edge through to the keeper, big appeal from Boucher, Johnson doesn't wait for the umpire's decision and decides to walk
scorcher of a delivery first up, 151.1 kmph, that was short, Hauritz manages to get his bat in the way, a thin edge goes past the keeper and runs away for four
another bouncer, Hauritz hops onto the backfoot and defends, the ball hits bat around face-high, the bottom hand came off as Hauritz defended
fuller this time, Hauritz nicks it again, this time thick enough for third man to come around and cut it off
length ball outside off, 152kmph, Hauritz jabs it towards point for a single and keeps the strike
Hauritz steers the ball towards point, just as he did in the previous ball, to give Hussey the strike
superb from Hussey, full and wide of offstump, but Hussey loves hitting it over midwicket and that's where he hits it
similar delivery, pitches behind the stump outside off, Hussey was aiming for mid-on to midwicket again but misses the ball
low full toss again from Morne, Hussey's thrash goes back to the bowler
Shot! another full toss, was a bit higher this time allowing Hussey to get under it, boy did he did that, it goes twenty rows back over long-on
another full toss, driven forcefully to long-off by Hussey, the single lets him retain the strike
shortish and wide, 146kmph, Hussey tried to crash that past point, doesn't connect, lucky to get away with that one Steyn
a bit fuller from Steyn, Hussey moves to the leg side, hits it over cover, Duminy gives chase but can't cut it off
yorker length ball, just outside off, Hussey powers it to extra cover for a single
dot ball, shortish, holds it line after pitching just outside off, Hauritz can't get any bat on that one
short and wide from Steyn, Haurotz throws his bat at it, gets a top edge which balloons towards Ntini at third man, but it lands well short and goes on the bounce to Ntini
superb yorker, 145kmph, on middle and leg, cramped Hussey for room, and he can only stab it back to the bowler, that means Hauritz will be on strike when the final over starts
slow full toss outside off, seemed to have fooled Hauritz, but he manages to toe end it, it races away fine for a boundary
this one is on a length, but wide enough for Hauritz to free his arms, he slaps it to the sweeper for a single

he needn't have bothered, that was a massive six, it was a short of length ball, pitching middle and angling away, Hussey gets on the front foot and gets under that one, absolutely hammered over long-on, even bigger than the previous six

low full toss well outside off, Hussey doesn't care, he's going to smash everything between long-on and midwicket, doesn't get hold of it this time, lobs towards mid-on, Albie dives but can't get there in time
another low full toss, Hauritz slams it down the ground, so straight that the fielder can't get round to cut it off
chipped inside-out this time by Hauritz, that fetches him a couple, Hauritz has played a good hand here, 20 off 11 balls

inn2.comm: Full and moves a touch inwards, Amla plays an elegant flick, but straight to square leg, no run
whoah, that was very wide outside off
back of a length, on offstump, Amla gets back and defends solidly towards extra cover
fuller and just a bit of width for Amla, a forceful square drive, doesn't beat Michael Clarke at point, that was 147kmph
good line from Johnson, in the corridor outside off, Amla watchfully shoulders arms to that one
this came back in a long way, Amla didn't have too much of a clue about that, rapped on the pads, that was a touch too high though
fullish from Johnson this time, Amla mistimes a drive towards mid-on to get a single and keep the strike
starts off with a ball that angles across Amla, who doesn't offer a shot and watches it through to the keeper
and again, this time closer to the offstump, Amla gets on the front foot but lets it go again
shorter from Bracken, Amla quickly hops onto the backfoot and lashes that behind point for a single
back of a length, pitching outside off and goes on with the angle, Smith plays inside the line and is beaten
similar line from Bracken, Smith walks across the stumps and nudges it behind square leg for a single
length ball from Bracken, Amla tries to crash it through covers but doesn't beat the field
that was a wild delivery, low full toss going down leg, Smith gets some bat on it, guiding it to fine leg for a single
this was wide outside off, Amla flashes at it, it flies uppishly towards third man, where the fielder runs across to his right to cut it off
Smith defends it cautiously to the leg side
tests him with a short ball, Smith isn't worried about the fingers he had broken, he hooks Johnson off the front foot for a boundary
fuller on middle and leg, Smith taps it wide of mid-on for a single
this time Johnson strays down the leg side, Amla has a swish at it but doesn't connect, that's deemed a wide
much better from Johnson to end the over, just short of a length, slanting across Amla, who slaps it towards cover
fullish and on middle and leg, driven to mid-on by Smith for a single
length ball on the pads, Amla is on to it in a flash, whips it away to the square leg boundary

Amla's walked, extraordinary scenes here, it was wide outside off, Amla opened the face to glide it to third man, it goes through to the keeper, who barely appeals, there's a half-hearted shout from first slip as well, Amla didn't wait for the verdict, he took his gloves off and set off for the pavilion, hard to tell from the replays whether he edged it
length ball, on offstump, Gibbs gets forward and defends awkwardly
opens the face and steers the ball to third man, works that one with the angle to get off the mark
cautiously prodded towards cover by Smith, no run there
fullish delivery from Johnson, square driven by Gibbs, straight to the fielder at point
slower ball from Johnson, 127kmph, Gibbs was initially interested in that one but withdraws his bat at the last moment
length ball, angling across Gibbs, he gets forward and defends it towards cover
same length, but this time Johnson has it headed for middle and leg, Gibbs had to make a late adjustment to nudge the ball towards square leg
poor ball from Johnson, short and wide, Gibbs says thank you very much and slams it uppishly through point for a boundary
Johnson comes back with a peach, just a bit of movement into Gibbs, who offers a half-hearted forward defence, but is beaten
angled into the pads, flicked towards midwicket, straight to the fielder, no run there
full on middle and leg, Smith gets on the front foot and defends back to the bowler
punched towards the covers, that's another dot ball
Bracken sends it down at 123kmph, Smith wanted to force that past mid-off, gets an outside edge and the ball goes too fine for third man to cut it off
another edge for Smith, this time he wanted to get it towards midwicket, but the ball flies towards extra cover
played with more conviction by smith this time, Bracken drops it slightly short, Smith gets on the back foot and nurdles it behind square leg
big appeal for lbw, that was overpitched and hit Smith on the pads, but that was slanting down the legside
driven to mid-off by Smith
a wild heave from Smith, a slow bouncer from Johnson, Smith was through with the shot before the ball arrived
Johnson searching for the yorker, but ends up as a half-volley on legstump, Smith dispatches it to the square-leg boundary
Johnson shifts his line to outside off, Smith punches that towards covers, doesn't get it past the field
length delivery around offstump, Smith pushes it back past the bowler and mid-off has some fielding to do
Gibbs misses out on a legstump half-volley, he tried to whip that to sqaure leg but misses and is hit on the pads
another legstump ball, shorter this time, Gibbs gets some bat on it and it runs away fine on the leg side , Haddin and Michael Hussey make the long chase to retrieve the ball
bang! smashed over the covers by Gibbs, that was fullish, and he took a big stride and smashed it, it was in the air and didn't beat the cover fielder by much
a bit of movement into the batsman for Bracken, pitching about a foot outside off, Gibbs shoulders arms to that one
similar ball, just a touch closer to the batsman, and Gibbs decides to offer his front foot defence to that one
Bracken keeps pegging away around that offstump, Gibbs leaves that one alone, replays suggest there could have been a faint nick, but there wasn't much of an appeal from the Australians
shortish ball, and a bit of width, Smith slaps it towards deep backward point for a couple
slanting across Smith, who gets on the front foot and defends it carefully
pushed to the offside with soft hands for a quick single
Gibbs gets behind the line of that one and defends
back of a length, on offstump, Gibbs defends it towards extra cover off the backfoot
walks across the stumps and turns it to square leg for a single to end the over
overpitched and very wide from Bracken, Smith cracks that through the overs for a boundary, superbly timed by Smith
shimmies down the wicket, whips an outside off delivery towards the leg side, no run though
length ball, and a bit of width, crunched towards short cover by Smith
very wide from Bracken, Smith chases after it but doesn't make contact, the umpire deems it a 'wide'
fullish ball again, Smith gets a big stride in and bunts it towards mid-off for a single that brings up South Africa's fifty
outside the offstump, Gibbs shuffles across the stumps and defends it back down the pitch
slanting across Gibbs, who decides to let that one go through to the keeper
slower ball, 111.4 kmph, good length, angling across Smith, who goes for the booming drive but doesn't connect
short ball this time, on middle and leg, Smith swivels as he pulls that to fine leg, only a single for a lot of effort
Shot! that was on a length, Gibbs comes down the track, plays it on the up, an inside out drive over the infield
similar delivery, Gibbs gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
shuffles across the stumps and nudges it behind square leg for a single
pitched up, Gibbs was again looking for the big drive, mistimes it towards the fielder at cover
wide, length ball, Smith is content to drive away from the body, he slaps it through the covers
cheeky from Gibbs, that was lap swept from outside off, it's was running away very fine, Laughlin makes good ground and throws in a dive to keep the batsmen to two
tries to mow a short ball to midwicket, he toe ends and it swirls in the air but lands beyond the fielder running back from midwicket
Gibbs gets a big stride in as drives towards mid-off for a single
Smith shows Gibbs how to heave the ball toward midwicket, it was back of a length, Smith gets on the front foot, and slams it in front of deep midwicket
slower ball from Bracken, deftly played towards third man by Smith, who has raced along to 36 off 34
Laughlin again starts the over with a slower delivery, 113kmph, Smith looks to drive, gets an outside edge which trickles away fine, fetches Smith two
Smith starts moving away from the stumps early, Laughlin fires in a yorker which lands just outside off, Smith tries to squeeze that to point, doesn't get any bat on it
slower ball again, 113kmph, ends up as a high full toss, pushed back to the bowler by Smith
Smith gets forward and opens the face of the bat, steers it to square third man for a single
keeps it around the offstump, played plays it towards point
full on middle and leg, Gibbs drives it towards mid-on for a single
starts off with a length ball on offstump, Gibbs square drives it forcefully, but placement is poor, straight at the fielder
goes for a sweep from outside off, but gets beaten
shortish from Hopes, a short-arm jab from Gibbs takes the ball behind square leg for a single
Hopes keeps it steady, length ball around offstump, Smith plays with soft hands towards mid-off and the batsmen steal a single
similar ball to Gibbs, he dabs it behind point for a single
Smith carves it inside out over extra cover for a boundary, again wonderful timing from Smith
pitched up by Laughlin, Gibbs takes a leaf from Smith's books, beautifully timed cover drive which beats the man to the rope
this time it's the placement which catches the eye, it was a low full toss on legstump, Gibbs flicks it away to the boundary, bisecting midwicket and square leg
bouncer from Laughlin, Gibbs goes for the pull but doesn't make contact with the ball
defended towards point by Gibbs this time
overpitched on middle and leg, Gibbs gets on the front foot and turns it away towards midwicket
Laughlin grunts as he sends down a bouncer, it's way over Smith's head and wqas down leg side, easy call for the umpire
slower ball, 110kmph, to end the over, Smith plays it cautiously towards cover
back of a length and a bit of width, Gibbs stays in his crease and pushes it towards covers for a single
much closer to the stumps this time, similar length though, Smith taps it towards mid-on for a single

Gibbs falls, not exactly the best of deliveries, short if a length and outside off, Gibbs throws his bat at that, hits it very well but Michael Clarke at point takes a good diving catch, that's the breakthrough Australia needed
de Villiers gets off the mark with a flick behind square for a single
length ball on offstump, Smith gets on the front foot and looks to defend, gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
starts off with a length ball on off, Smith defends off the backfoot
slower ball from Johnson, de Villiers turns it towards midwicket for a single
fullish and fast, 142.2kmph, nearly managed to get it between bat and pad, Smith gets an inside edge on to his pads
holds back the length a bit, outside off, de Villiers strokes it to point

de Villiers goes lbw, Asoka de Silva rules de Villiers out, there was a big inside edge on that one, it was a back of a length delivery, hit his pads in front of middle but there was bat involved before the ball hit pads, de Villiers can't believe the decision, he shakes his head as he walks off
full and slanting into the pads, 144kmph, Duminy gets off the mark by nurdling it towards square leg
big appeal off the first ball, nicely tossed up, drifts in andd straightens, that was a close call
defended watchfully off the front foot
short and a touch wide, turned awqay from the batsman, cut towards point for a single
Smith walks across the stumps to sweep Hauritz fine, that will fetch him a single
this time Duminy sweeps, he also picks up a single
Hopes starts the over with a back of a length ball just outside off, driven off the back foot to mid-on
lovely shot from Duminy for no runs, smashed straight down the ground and it crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end
that ball was pretty close to the body, Duminy decided to go for the cut anyway, doesn't get hold of it
opens the face and runs it to third man for a single
good end to a good over, length ball and keeps it tight, just around off, smith defends it down the ground
looks to turn it to the leg side, gets an edge and the ball squirts away towards point
flatter this time from Hauritz, Smith gets on his knee and slog-sweeps it to midwicket
another leading edge for Duminy, this time he comes down the track to on-drive, and the ball balloons towards mid-off
Duminy stays on the backfoot and cuts it behind point for a single
chopped powerfully past point for a single
Duminy waltzes down the track and looks to defend, he is hit on the pad
Hopes keeps pegging away at a good length, this time on middle and leg, smith pushes it towards short midwicket
similar ball, Smith again prods it towards short midwicket, Laughlin does the fielding
gives himself room to play the full ball, gets himself a single that brings up his fifty
length ball and Duminy pushes it to mid-on for a single
Hopes holds back the length a touch, Smith delicately glides it to third man for a single
short ball on the legstump, a flamboyant pull from Duminy, but the placement isn't very good, straight to man at deep square led and he only gets a single
Duminy gets a big stride in and sweeps towards fine leg
defended watchfully off the backfoot by Smith
Smith goes for the sweep again, gets a top edge which loops out of reach of the keeper
Duminy has also decided to combat Hauritz with the sweep, this time he gets a single

Smith falls, big wicket for Australia, Hauritz hasn't been afraid to toss the ball up and he gets his reward, Smith was looking to play to the on side, gets a leading edge which results in a simple caught and bowled
Hopes continues his water torture, the same length, just outside off, Duminy chops it towards points
on the pads this time, Duminy tips it to the leg side and the batsmen steal a single
Boucher defends watchfully off the backfoot, that was hopes again on a length around off
and again, no room for the batsmen to work with whatsoever, Boucher stabs it towards point
this time it a touch wide, Boucher drives away from his body, towards extra cover
yorker, around offstump, Boucher squeezes it out towards point
Duminy tries to sweep a wide outside-off ball, it was too slow for him, he was nearly through with the shot before the ball came on
fullish on the legs, Duminy misses out on a chance to get some runs, he is struck on the pads outside leg
short and turning into the batsman, Boucher plays it towards square leg
Boucher's falls and South Africa are in real trouble now, Boucher plays a shot which can be described as a checked-sweep, gets a top edge which lobs to the keeper for an easy catch
a wristy drive towards mid-on first up from Botha
Botha walks across the stumps and plays it towards midwicket this time
driven to mid-on, no run
a bit of width for Duminy he flashes at it, gets it away to third man for a single
bouncer from Hopes, Botha didn't spot it early, he just about managed to evade it
dabbed towards point, a bit of confusion in the calling but the batsmen make it safely
driven back to the bowler by Duminy, no run
full and on middle and off, Duminy punches it to mid-on this time but there's no run to be had
a touch short from Hauritz, Botha gets on the backfoot and gets it away to square leg
Duminy sweeps towards midwicket for a couple
full ball, nicely flighted, duminy is hit on the pads, hawkeye says that would have spun to hit offstump, didn't look out to the naked eye though
cut away to deep point for a couple of runs, another good over from Hauritz
lovely straight drive from Botha, he took it on the up and timed it beautifully, straight down the ground for four
Hopes keeps it on a length, pegs away at offstump, driven back to the bowler
bouncer down the leg side, Botha goes for the pull but misses
full and wide, mistimed towards extra cover by Botha, the batsmen steal a quick single
JP Duminy commits hara-kiri, not much footwork as he tried to pull  a short-of-length ball from Hopes, gets an edge and the ball swirls to mid-on
goes for the pull but mishits it towards point
pushed off the front foot towards cover for a single
tossed up on a length and thats driven back toward Hauritz
there's a positive stroke, he picks the wide delivery and drives superbly into the gap in the covers and the sweeper cannot cut it off
tossed up, gets some dip, pushed off the front foot to cover
short ball, he gets back and cuts it out to the sweeper
pitches on the stumps, tucked away towards the fielder
flighted just outside off stump and he defends it to point
pitched up outside off stump, no shot offered by Botha

ripping short delivery gets Botha! Johnson steams in and bangs in a brute of a short one that fairly kicks up off the track and though an airborne Botha rears his head out of harm's way he cannot drop the hands in time and the ball kisses his gloves before settling in the fielder's hands at gully ... there really wasn't much he could do about that ball .. absolutely vicious snorter
very full outside off stump, Morne drives and misses
pitches outside leg stump and he flicks it past square leg
pitches on a tight line and he dabs it away for one
slided down leg stump, brushes the pads to Haddin
slow delivery, drifts down leg stump, watchfully patted back
wide of off stump and turning away, no shot offered
quicker one on the stumps and he pushes it to the off side
flights it on a length, off stump or thereabouts, and Albie defends
fuller, flatter, and clipped out to the man at deep midwicket
pitches outside off stump, he goes back and dabs it past point
back of a length and outside off, Albie swings and he misses
much closer to the stumps, Albie dabs it towards point for a single
slips in the bouncer, very short, goes past shoulder high for the 6'6" Morne
a bit fuller this time, and it's Morne turn to swing and miss
slower ball this time, 128kmph, on a length and heading for offstump, Morne defends cautiously
back to usual speed, 144.1kmph, Morne tries to clip it off his legs, misses and is hit on the pads
Albie stays on the backfoot and deftly places it wide of the slip for a single
too short from Hauritz, Morne rocks back and hits it to mid-on
defended back down the pitch by Albie off the backfoot
very short from Hauritz, Albie capitalises, swings it hard over wide mid-on for a boundary
nicely tossed up by Hauritz, Albie was charging down the track, tried to loft it over mid-on, misses the ball and Haddin has an easy stumping
a wristy shot takes an outside off ball towards midwicket

starts off yet another of his overs with a slower ball, full ball and pretty wide, Steyn was onto his shot early, checks and can only spoon it to Michael Hussey at short cover, that's Laughlin's first wicket in ODIs
short ball, well outside off, Ntini leaves that one alone
another slower ball, fuller this time, Ntini defends off the front foot
back of a length, offstump line, another exhibition of Makhaya Ntini's front-foot defence
Laughlin fires in the bouncer, Ntini manages to get out of the way
fullsih ball just outside off, Ntini carves it through covers for a couple

this match is over, Australia have walloped South Africa by 141 runs, another flighted delivery from Hauritz, very full, Morne tries to slam it over mid-on, doesn't quite get hold of it, it goes high and gives Laughlin at mid-on a catch  , Hauritz finishes with four wickets
